input.activity_signal: Company appears active based on multiple web search results showing current business listings and profiles. Most notably, a 2025 blog post indicates "Teliax, Leap Telecom and Toll-Free Exchange Rebrand as Ringer" (April 30, 2025), suggesting recent corporate activity and transformation. Additional evidence includes active business directory listings on NAICSlist, ZoomInfo, RocketReach, and Alignable showing current operations.
input.product_summary: Leap Telecom provides unified communications services including hosted IP PBX, SIP/VoIP handsets, contact center software, conferencing services, and toll-free services to businesses ranging from small companies to enterprise-level contact centers.
